name: sharable-password-protected-posts
description: Share password protected posts via secret URLs
author: gaambo

scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:php
scripts.i18n:pot: wp-env run cli wp i18n make-pot wp-content/plugins/sharable-password-protected-posts wp-content/plugins/sharable-password-protected-posts/languages/good-slider.pot --exclude="build" --domain=good-slider
scripts.i18n:php: wp-env run cli wp i18n make-php wp-content/plugins/sharable-password-protected-posts/languages
